name: Period of Employee
query:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, date_of_joining, CURDATE()) < 1 THEN '< 1 Tahun'
    WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, date_of_joining, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 1 AND 2 THEN '1 - 3 Tahun'
    WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, date_of_joining, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 3 AND 4 THEN '3 - 5 Tahun'
    ELSE '> 5 Tahun'
  END AS masa_kerja,
  COUNT(*) AS jumlah
FROM `tabEmployee`
WHERE status = 'Active'
  AND date_of_joining IS NOT NULL
  AND department = IFNULL(%(department)s, department)
GROUP BY masa_kerja
